metadata.title: Physical oceanography of the Strait of Juan de Fuca, 1998-present
metadata.description: Physical oceanographic observations used to construct models of circulation in the Strait of Juan de Fuca.
keywords: South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Constructing a model of circulation in the Strait of Juan de Fuca.

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Data are in electronic format, well backed up and well documented.
Risk of Loss: Low
Impact Justification: Does not affect a wide variety of users.
Impact of Loss: Low
Recommended Action: None

Status: In work

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: May Be Private

Use constraints: Some data have not been quality checked.

Distribution liability: [unknown]

Native data set environment: Expected Growth Rate: Null

Data quality - Logical consistency: CTD data processed using normal IOS processing procedures. Normal standardization of CTD instruments at IOS.
Data quality - Completeness: Dataset Complications: The accuracy of the CTD data may vary depending on the instruments used and whether collaborating data were collected for intercomparison purposes.  Guildline CTDs are standardized at IOS; Sea-Bird CTD`s are calibrated at Sea-Bird Electronics in Bellevue, Washington.
Electronic Data Complications: Null
